mcq.statement: Choose the CORRECT sentence: She has beauty, brains, and wealth; a rare combination., She has beauty, brains, and wealth: a rare combination., She has beauty, brains and wealth-a rare combination., She has beauty, brains, and wealth-a rare combination.

options.a: She has beauty, brains, and wealth; a rare combination.
options.b: She has beauty, brains, and wealth: a rare combination.
options.c: She has beauty, brains and wealth-a rare combination.
options.d: She has beauty, brains, and wealth-a rare combination.
